questions.question: The differential equation 2(dy/dx) + (x^2)y = 2x + 3, y(0) = 5 is...
choices: Undeterminable to be linear or nonlinear

A spaceship is 75m long according to an astronaut on the ship. As it travels away from Earth, scientists on the ground measure the length of the ship to be 51m. How fast is the spaceship traveling away from Earth?

choices: I cannot until I finish this exam.
